incidents.name: Call quality issue from subscribers in Canada and United states of America via a subset of Long codes

incident_updates.body: Twilio Voice was degraded for 2 hours between 10:00 PM and 12:00 AM Pacific Time on 02/02/2026. During this period of time customers may have experienced Call quality issue from subscribers in Canada and United states of America via a subset of Long codes. The issue has now been resolved.

Account Upgrade flow in TrustHub portal in Console is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently seeing degraded performance on our TrustHub portal in Console. Customers are unable to create Compliance Profiles, Branded Calling registrations, or Regulatory Compliance Bundles, and will see an error in Console. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Issue Accessing WhatsApp Sender Configuration

incident_updates.body: Access issues to the WhatsApp sender configuration page in the Twilio Console have been resolved, and the service is operating normally at this time.

We have identified the issue and are actively working on the fix where customers are unable to access the WhatsApp sender configuration page in the Twilio Console. Affected users may encounter an error message stating, "Something went wrong. An internal server error has occurred. We are unable to handle this request at the moment. Try again later."

We will provide updates in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.
